import React from 'react' import { Container } from 'react-bootstrap' import { Row, Col, Button, Alert } from 'react-bootstrap' import { useLocation, useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' import { LoginAlert } from '../components/LoginAlert' import { SearchBar } from '../components/SearchBar' import DeleteBookModal from '../components/DeleteBookModal' import OfferBookModal from '../components/OfferBookModal' function BookListingInformation() { const Authentication = localStorage.getItem('Authentication'); const location = useLocation(); const navigate = useNavigate(); return (

{location.state.Title}

{/* Shawn */} {location.state.Price === 0 ? "Free" : null} {location.state.Price > 0 ? "$" + location.state.Price : null} {location.state.Route === "MyListings" && Authentication === "true" ? : null } {location.state.Route !== "MyListings" && Authentication === "true" ? : null } {location.state.Route !== "MyListings" && Authentication === null ? : null}

{location.state.Condition}

{location.state.Route === "MyListings" ? : null}
Description
{location.state.Route === "MyListings" && Authentication === "true" ? : null}

{location.state.Description}
Location

location_on {location.state.Location}

); } export default BookListingInformation;
